message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $110. I believe it's a fair price considering its value. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe I can find the product elsewhere for a lower price. I am willing to pay up to $95 for your product. Let me know if this works for you!

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal. While I appreciate your offer, $95 is still below what I'm willing to accept. I'm willing to come down to $105. This is a fair price, considering the value of the product. What do you think?

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am still looking for a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose $100 for your product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
